text: Oleg Anatolyevich Nikulin (; born 8 February 1970; died 17 January 2006 in Novosibirsk) was a Russian football player. He was a best scorer in history of FC Sibir Novosibirsk before being overtaken by Dmitri Akimov. ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Sibir Novosibirsk players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Asmaral Moscow players Category:FC Yugra Nizhnevartovsk players Category:Association football forwards
title: Oleg Nikulin
